001package org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.impl;
002
003/*
004 *
005 */
006
007
008
009import java.io.Serializable;
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012
013import org.biopax.psidev.ontology_manager.OntologyTermI;
014
015/**
016 * Representation of a cv term.
017 *
018 * @author Florian Reisinger (florian@ebi.ac.uk)
019 * @author Samuel Kerrien (skerrien@ebi.ac.uk)
020 * @version $Id$
021 * @since 2.0.0
022 */
023public class OntologyTermImpl implements OntologyTermI, Serializable {
024
025    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
026
027    private String acc;
028
029    private String name;
030
031    private Collection<String> nameSynonyms;
032    
033    private String ontologyId;
034
035    //////////////////////////
036    // Constructors
037
038    public OntologyTermImpl( String acc ) {
039        setTermAccession( acc );
040    }
041
042    public OntologyTermImpl( String ont, String acc, String name ) {
043        this(acc);
044        this.name = name;
045        this.ontologyId = ont;
046    }
047    
048    ///// ///// ///// ///// /////
049    // Getter & Setter
050
051    public void setTermAccession( String accession ) {
052        if ( accession == null || accession.trim().length() == 0 ) {
053            throw new IllegalArgumentException( "You must give a non null/empty term accession" );
054        }
055        acc = accession;
056    }
057
058    public String getTermAccession() {
059        return acc;
060    }
061
062    public void setPreferredName( String preferredName ) {
063        name = preferredName;
064    }
065
066    public Collection<String> getNameSynonyms() {
067        if ( nameSynonyms == null ) {
068            nameSynonyms = new ArrayList();
069        }
070        return nameSynonyms;
071    }
072
073    public void setNameSynonyms( Collection<String> nameSynonyms ) {
074        this.nameSynonyms = nameSynonyms;
075    }
076
077    public String getPreferredName() {
078        return name;
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    public String toString() {
083        final StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
084        sb.append( "OntologyTermImpl" );
085        sb.append( "{acc='" ).append( acc ).append( '\'' );
086        sb.append( ", name='" ).append( name ).append( '\'' );
087        sb.append( '}' );
088        return sb.toString();
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public boolean equals( Object o ) {
093        if ( this == o ) return true;
094        if ( o == null || getClass() != o.getClass() ) return false;
095
096        OntologyTermImpl that = ( OntologyTermImpl ) o;
097
098        if ( !acc.equals( that.acc ) ) return false;
099
100        return true;
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public int hashCode() {
105        int result;
106        result = acc.hashCode();
107        return result;
108    }
109
110        public String getOntologyId() {
111                return this.ontologyId;
112        }
113
114        public void setOntologyId(String ontologyId) {
115                this.ontologyId = ontologyId;
116        }
117}
